content: SeedlyTV EP02 Miles Credit Card Asked by AnonymousAsked on 09 Apr 2019Can I change my SQ J saver seat to a suites saver award seat on a different date and route?!?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Keith Ng, Assistant Manager at National University Of SingaporeLevel 3. WonderkidAnswered on 10 Apr 2019Yes, you can.There'll be services fees involved:  https://www.singaporeair.com/en_UK/us/ppsclub-krisflyer/forms-and-fees/service-fees/ The easiest way is to cancel your SQ J Saver, redeposit the miles (USD75), and book your new SQ Suites Saver. It'll cost the same as changing date (USD25), route (USD25), and cabin class (USD25).0 comments0
